name: ALTOCAP PTY LTD
about: Altocap Flight School, based in Camden, Australia, is a reputable institution dedicated to providing comprehensive flight training. Our qualified instructors guide students through various programs, including the Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). We also offer specialized courses such as the Flight Instructor Rating (FIR) and endorsements in multi-engine and instrument rating training. With in-house flight examiners covering 26 different flight approvals, we ensure students are well-prepared for their flight tests. Altocap also provides student study loans and Examiner Proficiency Checks (EPC). Our courses are designed to make students more employable, with outcomes including spinning activity endorsement and design feature course certificates. We are committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their career goals in aviation.
services:
["Recreational Pilot License
Private Pilot Licence
Night Visual Flight Rating
Commercial Pilot Licence
Multi-Engine Class Rating
Instrutment Rating & Private Instrument Rating
Flight Instructor Rating
Theory courses"]
